languages.text: When you {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} an enemy with the bonebreaker maul, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gain random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

При провале цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g} и получает случайную {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the wielder hits an enemy with the Bonebreaking Maul, the target must pass a Toughness resistance tesr or suffer −10 Strength until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times. Grants a +10% stacking chance to stun an enemy for one turn for each point of their deflection. A successful Toughness test negates this effect. Maces and hammers have a special attack that pushes enemies away.

When you hit an enemy with the bonebreaker maul, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance test with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gain random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

При провале цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g} и получает случайную {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g}.

languages.text: 使用碎骨者巨槌{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，同时获得随机{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: When you {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} an enemy with the bonebreaker maul, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gain random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用碎骨者巨槌{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态，同时获得随机{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}效果。

languages.text: 砕骨の大槌を使って敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットは−10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を合格するか、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}し、ランダムな{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: When you {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} an enemy with the bonebreaker maul, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gain random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 砕骨の大槌の攻撃が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットは−10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を合格しない限り{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}うつ伏せ{/g}に倒れ、ランダムに{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}が付与される。

languages.text: Si consigues {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} a un enemigo con la maza quebrantahuesos, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 o quedará {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} y sufrirá una {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} al azar.
languages.original_text: When you {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} an enemy with the bonebreaker maul, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gain random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si consigues {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g} a un enemigo con la maza quebrantahuesos, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 o quedará {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} y sufrirá una {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} al azar.

languages.text: Wenn du einen Feind mit dem Knochenbrecher-Streitkolben {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}triffst{/g}, muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 bestehen, sonst wird es {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} und erleidet ein zufälliges {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g}.
languages.original_text: When you {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} an enemy with the bonebreaker maul, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gain random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn du einen Feind mit dem Knochenbrecher-Streitkolben {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}triffst{/g}, muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 bestehen, sonst wird es {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} und erleidet ein zufälliges {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque vous portez un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} à un ennemi à l'aide de la masse briseuse d'os, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et un {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} aléatoire.
languages.original_text: When you {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} an enemy with the bonebreaker maul, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gain random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque vous portez un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} à un ennemi à l'aide de la masse briseuse d'os, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -10, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et un {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} aléatoire.
